title: The impact of vaccine type and booster dose on the magnitude and breadth of SARS-CoV-2-specific systemic and mucosal antibodies among COVID-19 vaccine recipients
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Hoi-Wah Tsoi, Miko Ka-Wai Ng, Jian-Piao Cai, Rosana Wing-Shan Poon, Brian Pui-Chun Chan, Kwok-Hung Chan, Anthony Raymond Tam, Wing-Ming Chu, Ivan Fan-Ngai Hung, Kelvin Kai-Wang To
